articles.description: 'Our batting just wasn't good'
articles.content:
New Zealand completed the first step of its mission for the home summer when it beat the West Indies by an innings and 134 runs on Sunday on the fourth morning of the first cricket Test.

articles.title: Starling arrested over Central Coast incident - NRL.COM
articles.description: Canberra hooker Tom Starling was one of four men charged after police were allegedly assaulted during an incident on the Central Coast on Saturday night.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pogba, Greenwood inspire Man United in comeback win over West Ham - The World Game
articles.description: Fabulous second-half goals from Paul Pogba and Mason Greenwood helped Manchester United come from behind again and claim a 3-1 Premier League victory at West Ham.
articles.content:
Having won 3-2 from two goals down at Southampton last weekend and also conceding first in a 3-1 win over Everton at Goodison Park, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's men were abject during the first half.
